Class EndpointBase

A base object for any OpenAI API endpoint, encompassing common functionality

| Improve this Doc View Source

Endpoint

The name of the endpoint, which is the final path segment in the API URL. Must be overriden in a derived class.

Declaration
protected abstract string Endpoint { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String
| Improve this Doc View Source

Url

Gets the URL of the endpoint, based on the base OpenAI API URL followed by the endpoint name. For example "https://api.openai.com/v1/completions";

Declaration
protected string Url { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

System.Net.Http.HttpClient

Type Condition
System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException

Thrown if there is no valid authentication. Please refer to https://github.com/OkGoDoIt/OpenAI-API-dotnet#authentication for details.

GetErrorMessage(String, HttpResponseMessage, String, String)

Formats a human-readable error message relating to calling the API and parsing the response

Type Name Description

| Improve this Doc View Source

HttpStreamingRequest<T>(String, HttpMethod, Object)

Sends an HTTP request and handles a streaming response. Does basic line splitting and error handling.

Declaration
protected async IAsyncEnumerable<T> HttpStreamingRequest<T>(string url = null, HttpMethod verb = null, object postData = null)
    where T : ApiResultBase
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String url

(optional) If provided, overrides the url endpoint for this request. If omitted, then Url will be used.
System.Net.Http.HttpMethod verb

(optional) The HTTP verb to use, for example "System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get". If omitted, then "GET" is assumed.
System.Object postData

(optional) A json-serializable object to include in the request body.
Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<T>

The HttpResponseMessage of the response, which is confirmed to be successful.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException

Throws an exception if a non-success HTTP response was returned
